name: Etherial grace
description:
Name: Joseph Taylor
submission for character model 'Etherial grace'

A godly creature of the cosmos with floating planets surrounding them, they arrive at the end of a game to test the player to see if they're ready for the final threat.
They appear through a portal and use their enormous hands to shape the galaxy.
Flowing locks of star matter erupt from it's head showing their beauty.
